question.text: <math><mo>[</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>]</mo></math> and <math><mo>[</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><msub><mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>]</mo></math> are

solution.text: <math><mo>[</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>]</mo></math> and <math><mo>[</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><msub><mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>]</mo></math> shows linkage isomerism.
